title: "Course Overview"

The course consists of one lecture (starting from the 1st of November 2021) and two practical sessions per week. For the practical sessions, the group will be split into five groups of equal size. 

<br>

| Practical session 2 | Dr. Philipp Masur | **HG-01A32** (Tuesday, 11:00), **HG-11A22** (Thursday, 15:30) |
| Practical session 3 | Dr. Paulina Pankowska | **HG-11A36** (Tuesday, 9:00 & Thursday, 13:30) |
| Practical session 4 | Dr. Paulina Pankowska | **online via Zoom** (Tuesday, 11:00 & Thursday, 15:30) |
| Practical session 5 | Dr. Kasper Welbers |**HG-02A37** (Tuesday, 9:00 & Thursday, 13:30) |
